title: Honor - Tilt Proof, GG, Good Shot Calling
body:
What does this even mean? 

Okay, let me say first of all that this thread is to ask for a name change on these Honor tags.

So when it comes to honoring allies here's what goes through my head:

**Tilt Proof** - Do I give this to the guy that was polite or the guy that has said nothing all game? Do I give it to the one who said "no worries" when I derped a gank or the one that didn't give up?
**Good Shot Calling** - Is this used when someone uses 'omw' ping and successfully ganks or when they say to get Dragon or Herald and we get it? Do I honor the one that made a good play jumping on a good hook or the do I honor the one that made the hook?
**GG** - I just end up only ever using this one. 

Do the different honors actually do anything? Probably not. Does it feel good when you get them? Yea it does.

I would like it if the honor was like the old days of GG, Teamwork and Friendly (and let us honor an opponent too)
